TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_kkayal_sa_ryax_na_'tayal, title = kkayal_sa_ryax_na_'tayal, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/kkayal_sa_ryax_na_'tayal} }

S.FORM: Kkayal sa qutux ruax ryax na 'tayal hya sawn naha' qutux ryax hya' ga, sazing qu mcka' kkayal, qutux ga qlyan, qutux ga gbyan. qlyan hya' ga aring mayzbuq ru mhtuw wagi' ru kryaxan ru gaygbyan , yaqani qu sawn maha qlyan. gbyan hya ga, aring sa mzyup suruw na rgyax qu wagi' ru kska' bzngi' ru tayhuk slwan qani qu sawn maha gbyan. mayzbuq hya ga, aring min'aring tlapaw qu kayal ru mucing sa htgan wagi' ga yasa qu sawn mayzbuq. sasan hya ga, aring slwan qu kayal ru mkaraw wagi', ru zik kryaxan, ru kska' kryaxan ga yasa qu sawn maha sasan. babaw kinryax hya lga, aring kinryax lru msrihaw wagi' yani qu sawn maha babaw kinryax. ru htagan wagi' ru mzyup balay waqi' lga, yasa qu sawn maha gaygbyan la. mlhngan hya' ga, aring smsman ru kgbyan , ru pp'abi' , ru kska' bzngi' , ru min'aring mqwas ngta', minpusal mqwas ngta', ru mintaytzyul mqwas ngta', nanu' yaqu mintaytzyul mqwas ngta' lga, yasa qu mmawsa' qmayah lqu 'tayal la.

Kkayal sa qotox roax ryax na 'tayal hya sawn naha' qotox ryax hya' ga, sazing qo mcka' kkayal, qotox ga qlyan, qotox ga gbyan. qlyan hya' ga aring mayzboq ro mhtow wagi' ro kryaxan ro gaygbyan , yaqani qo sawn maha qlyan. gbyan hya ga, aring sa mzyop sorow na rgyax qo wagi' ro kska' bzngi' ro tayhok slwan qani qo sawn maha gbyan. mayzboq hya ga, aring min'aring tlapaw qo kayal ro mocing sa htgan wagi' ga yasa qo sawn mayzboq. sasan hya ga, aring slwan qo kayal ro mkaraw wagi', ro zik kryaxan, ro kska' kryaxan ga yasa qo sawn maha sasan. babaw kinryax hya lga, aring kinryax lro msrihaw wagi' yani qo sawn maha babaw kinryax. ro htagan wagi' ro mzyop balay waqi' lga, yasa qo sawn maha gaygbyan la. mlhngan hya' ga, aring smsman ro kgbyan , ro pp'abi' , ro kska' bzngi' , ro min'aring mqwas ngta', minposal mqwas ngta', ro mintaytzyol mqwas ngta', nano' yaqo mintaytzyol mqwas ngta' lga, yasa qo mmawsa' qmayah lqo 'tayal la.
